item.description:
This is being done as a joint activity with Variety of Fun For Young Adults.

I checked out the band's video, which can be viewed at http://www.worldpremi...

The music sounds really good and like it might be a good take. We can meet at 8:00 and those who wish to order dinner can do so. The music starts at 10:00 if you'd care to join us later.

To the best of my knowledge, there is no cover charge.

This is a good way to meet other people and hopefully foster inter-group cooperation.

Please write if you have any questions; I'll be happy to try and answer them.

-Charlie
item.how_to_find_us: Look for me; I'll probably be there by about 7:45.

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: Live music at The Charlie Horse in West Bridgewater featuring World Premier Band
